name: Funky River
description:
Funky River is heavily inspired by the game jam game “Pink River” by Kebabskal, you can check it out here: https://kebabskal.itch.io/pink-river

You are trying to sail down an endless river and will have to rearrange the blocks of your raft, to avoid obstacles and falling into the deadly river. Your score increases with the distance you go and the gems you collect.

Funky River has partial gamepad support - ie: only gameplay supports gamepads, menu interactions are keyboard + mouse only.

Platform / System
Windows PC

Asset credits

Game Engine used: Unreal Engine v. 4.26.1

Music:
Original song for the game by Hannibal Sigfusson -
https://soundcloud.com/hannibal-sigfusson/funky-river-soundtrack
https://www.fiverr.com/share/k2Zqlo
